name: The Way of Wine
description:
Ethan's parents grow concerned about him and propose a trip to the capital to meet his childhood friend and, perhaps, find love to secure the family's future.

On his journey, Ethan will cross paths with fascinating people and perhaps meet more potential brides, each with her own story to explore. Three exciting paths unfold before you, each offering a unique experience.

Which destination will you choose for Ethan? Step inside and follow The Way of Wine.
